review: The hotel service and room was good.the price we paid to stay in Pithoragarh was very economical.worth to stay.the breakfast we need was also nice..we came by scorpio..we were worried about parking.the hotel offered nice safe parking.
name: Pranay J

review: This Hotel is located in the middle of the city. Rooms donâ€™t provide any view. Basic hotel for rest and overnight stay. Staff is really courteous and the food served from its own restaurant was mind-blowing. Rates are very reasonable.
name: Adv.SiddharthVerma

review: Hotel is just opposite the ruin fort,on the main town the rooms are very well cleaned and carpeted facing the roadside,hotel has 22 well maintain rooms with hygienic restaurant.The front desk do not speak English but they take care of tourist,staff are very good,room service is prompt,super deluxe rooms are very good to stay on budget price we stayed for one night.the best in hotel is all the tourist visiting places and market are nearby.
name: DIPEN N
